author: tvami
body:
#### PR description:

Instead of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/35554

Also resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/27393

Original description
"This PR removes part of the configuration of L1T Calo which retrieves conditions from a specific location (instead of via GT) and which is deprecated for a while (non-used since we moved away from hacking conditions)."

Extra in this PR is the removal of m_useStaticConfig and it's follow-ups. As the comment in the header says
```
  // use static config for fw testing
  bool m_useStaticConfig;
```
This is for testing purposes, thus it should be fed to the code via a test python cfg file and not hardcoded in the cpp code

#### PR validation:

Previously failing addOnTest pass
```
addOnTests.py -j 8 -t hlt_mc_GRun
```

title: Removal of hardcoded testing L1T tag
